name: Eco Clean Carpet
overview:
Professional Dry & Organic Carpet Cleaning Company produly serving Las Vegas Area. We also taking care of your upholstery and furniture cleaning, bringing it back to its original beauty and fresh smell. Tile & Grout Cleaning. Our state-of-the art equipment and cleaning solutions are truly green.
Everything we use is non-toxic, non flammable, all materials are totally biodegradable, has no preservatives, acknowledged by the EPA’s program. Our Carpet Cleaning equipment is approved by Carpet and Rug Institute and other Eco Friendly Organizations. The biggest advantage of our cleaning system is extremely low moisture. The carpets drying time on average is about one hour. Using our machine we achieve great results as well as carpet pile recovering.

Visit our web site to check our current specials and promotions. http://www.ecocleanlv.com. Eco Clean, LLC. 4111 Sanderling cir 353, Las Vegas, 89103 | Phone (702) 757-1137
